    • getTowers

      public java.util.ArrayList<Tower> getTowers()

    • getEnemies

      public java.util.ArrayList<Enemy> getEnemies()

    • createTower

      public boolean createTower​(java.lang.String towerName, int x, int y, int radius)
      Method for creating a tower with coords (X, Y).
      Parameters:
      towerName - Tower type selected
      x - Cell X of the Tower
      y - Cell Y of the Tower
      radius - circle radius of the Tower
      Returns:
      true if the creation is OK else false

    • getTower

      public Tower getTower​(int x, int y)

    • moveEnemies

      public void moveEnemies()
      Method for moving all the enemies present in the game. If they are outside the window, then if they are added to the deletion list to be deleted in due time. This is to avoid memory overload.

    • createEnemies

      public void createEnemies()
      Method to create an enemy if the spawning process is not finished

    • createTowers

      public void createTowers()
      Method of creating a Tower and putting it on standby for processing.

    • updateGame

      public void updateGame()
      Method for detecting and if necessary adding an enemy, present within the radius of a Tower, to the deletion list while awaiting its treatment.

    • manageEnemies

      public void manageEnemies()
      Method to remove from the Game the Enemy to be deleted and add the created Enemy.

    • checkNextWave

      public void checkNextWave()
      Method to move on to the next Wave if all enemies have been killed and the wave is over.

    • gameFinnish

      public boolean gameFinnish()
      Method for detecting whether the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if the Game is finnish else false
